description: Understanding social media, how it works and how it can benefit journalism has been a rarity in newsrooms around the world. This course aims to provide journalists, media practitioners and the general public with knowledge about finding and distributing news and information in social media. Students will be introduced to common platforms, techniques, and ethical considerations.
title: Social Media for Journalists: The Basics
instructors: Amanda Zamora, Daniel Victor, Sharif Durhams, Craig Silverman and Ryan Thornburg
